attributes.title: Essence of Sadashivoham - Manifest Powers and Be Ferocious with Self-Doubt, Hatred & Denial
attributes.description:
In this video (21 December 2016), Paramahamsa Nithyananda gives His final message at the culmination of the groundbreaking 'Sadashivoham 2016' program. He declares all the program participants as a new species - new beings who are leading a breakthrough in consciousness on planet earth.

In His final message to the participants, He gives them this one ultimate spiritual technique to practice - manifestation of powers. It is the ultimate password and technique for the cosmos. All that is required is being ferocious with ourselves and our self doubts, self hatred, self denial and incompletions.
